poratto 波拉托, porbeagle 太平洋鼠鲨, porbandar 博尔本德尔

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from Cornish dialect, perhaps from Cornish porth 'harbour, cove' + bugel 'shepherd'

means.word_mean: 1. voracious pointed-nose shark of northern Atlantic and Pacific

auth_sentence.content: The oceanic whitetip, three varieties of hammerheads and the porbeagle are all said to be seriously threatened by overfishing.

auth_sentence.content: Fisheries have fought to keep their right to fish porbeagle sharks because their meat is so valuable, according to Ms Fordham.
